sect2.title: Вступ
sect2.para: The Default Applications capplet sets up some default programs to use for different events.

sect2.title: Типовий текстовий редактор
sect2.para: Ваш типовий текстовий редактор використовується, коли текстовий файл повинен бути відкритий для перегляду або редагування.

By default, Pluma is used as the text editor. However, as text editors are installed, more options are added to the Text Editor drop-down list. Choose your preferred Text Editor by selecting the right item in the System section.

sect2.title: Типовий оглядач тенет
sect2.para: Your default web browser is referred to when you click on a link that directs to a website.

By default, Firefox is used to view HTML files. However, as more browsers are installed, more choices will become available to use. Choose your preferred Web Browser by selecting the right item in the Internet section.

sect2.title: Типовий термінал
sect2.para: Your terminal window will sometimes be brought up to execute commands. For example, if you select to have an application be brought up in the console, the terminal defaults will be called. Numerous defaults for terminals exist; the default being MATE Terminal. Choose your preferred Terminal Emulator by selecting the right item in the System section.
